issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Ran "mvn test -Dtest=TestMiniLlapLocalCliDriver -Dqfile=sample10.q " after changing the table to be 
insert-only transactional. 

The following queries returns couple of rows whereis no row results returns for non-ACID table. 
query: select ds, count(1) from srcpartbucket tablesample (bucket 2 out of 4 on key) where ds is not null group by ds ORDER BY ds ASC

2008-04-08      14
2008-04-09      14
..
query: select ds, count(1) from srcpartbucket tablesample (bucket 1 out of 2 on key) where ds is not null group by ds ORDER BY ds ASC

2008-04-08      4
2008-04-09      4
fields.summary: Tablesample uses incorrect logic to pick files corresponding to buckets.

comments.body:
The semantics of the test looks like the results for insert-only transactional table is rather valid to
return couple of rows for the above two queries. I.e., possibly non-transactional regular table
return results of no row may be incorrect.

It looks like the results of the test returns two rows for the two queries on non-transactional 
table before patch of HIVE-18910

[~steveyeom2017] are you saying HIVE-18910 broke tablesample? 
[~djaiswal] the patch for murmur causes the queries in sample10 to produce no results. Was that by design? I see the test itself was actually changed for some reason in that patch. Seems like sample should still return some rows (which it does if table is converted to MM).
Hey [~sershe]I talked with Deepak and Jason. Deepak will check a bit.
[~sershe] can you please review?
